attribution_models.hybrid_similarity: 1 - mean normalized Euclidean distance across BGE-Large, GTE-Large, MiniLM embeddings.
attribution_models.temporal_alignment: Exponential decay of publication gap in days (exp(-|Δdays| / 365)).
attribution_models.graph_affinity: Weighted Jaccard overlap of authors (50%), dataset tags (30%), taxonomy tags (20%).
